text: Dong Hongyou (29 April 1950 â€“ 31 December 2022) was a Chinese children's writer. Dong studied at the Central China Normal University. He was a children's writer and member of the China Writers Association. He won the National Excellent Children's Literature Award. He served as vice chairman of and chairman of Wuhan Writers. Dong Hongyou died in Wuhan Union Hospital on 31 December 2022, at the age of 72. ==References== Category:Children's writers Category:20th-century Chinese writers Category:1950 births Category:2022 deaths Category:People from Hubei
title: Dong Hongyou
